title: Client Biome
description: Minecraft client_biome files define client-side settings for biomes in resource packs. This is the new preferred location for per-biome settings that used to be in biomes_client.json.

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

B_components_ref.title: Components
B_components_ref.description: Any components that this Client Biome uses.

C.title: Ambient Sounds
C.description: Sets the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

addition.title: Addition
addition.description: Named sound that occasionally plays at the listener position.

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Named sound that loops while the listener position is inside the biome.

mood.title: Mood
mood.description: Named sound that rarely plays at a nearby air block position when the light level is low.

D.title: Atmosphere Identifier
D.description:
Set the atmosphere settings used during deferred rendering.
Biomes without this component will have default atmosphere settings.

atmosphere_identifier.title: Atmosphere Identifier
atmosphere_identifier.description: Identifier of atmosphere definition to use

E.title: Biome Music
E.description: Affects how music plays within the biome.

music_definition.title: Music Definition
music_definition.description: Music to be played when inside this biome. If left off or not found the default music will be determined by the dimension. Empty string will result in no music.

volume_multiplier.title: Volume Multiplier
volume_multiplier.description: Multiplier temporarily and gradually applied to music volume when within this biome.

F.title: Color Grading Identifier
F.description:
Set the color_grading settings used during deferred rendering.
Biomes without this component will have default color_grading settings.

color_grading_identifier.title: Color Grading Identifier
color_grading_identifier.description: Identifier of color_grading definition to use

G.title: Dry Foliage Color
G.description: Set the dry foliage color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default dry foliage color behavior.

H.title: Fog Appearance
H.description: Set the fog settings used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default fog settings.

fog_identifier.title: Fog Identifier
fog_identifier.description: Identifier of fog definition to use.

I.title: Foliage Appearance
I.description: Set the foliage color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default foliage appearance.

color.title: Color
color.description: RGB color of foliage, or a Foliage Color Map object.

color_map.title: Color Map
color_map.description: Color map from textures/colormap to determine color of foliage.

J.title: Grass Appearance
J.description: Set the grass color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default grass appearance.

color.title: Color
color.description: RGB color of grass, or a Grass Color Map object.

color_map.title: Color Map
color_map.description: Color map from textures/colormap to determine color of grass.

BA.title: Lighting Identifier
BA.description:
Set the lighting settings used during deferred rendering.
Biomes without this component will have default lighting settings.

lighting_identifier.title: Lighting Identifier
lighting_identifier.description: Identifier of lighting definition to use

BB.title: Sky Color
BB.description: Set the sky color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default sky color behavior.

BC.title: Water Appearance
BC.description: Set the water surface color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water surface color behavior.

surface_color.title: Surface Color
surface_color.description: RGB color of the water surface.

surface_opacity.title: Surface Opacity
surface_opacity.description: Opacity of the water surface (0 for invisible and 1 for opaque)

BD.title: Water Identifier
BD.description:
Set the water settings used during deferred rendering.
Biomes without this component will have default water settings.

water_identifier.title: Water Identifier
water_identifier.description: Identifier of water definition to use

description.title: Client Biome Description
description.description: Contains non-component settings for a Client Biome.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The name of the Client Biome, used by other features like the '/locate biome' command. Must match the name of a Biome defined by the game or a behavior pack.
